name: Blast from the Past
description:
CONTROLS:

W - jump

A/D - walk left and right

S - get down

TAB - Portal edit mode

MOUSE  - select portals

A Medieval knight travels through different cliche time periods to end up battling robots in a cyberpunk dystopia!

Use portals wisely to get around the levels and advance to the next realm.

CREDITS:

Backgrounds : Nora Itch Page

Code & Levels: BlueDev5 GitHub

Pixel Art: loofie2 Instagram
